questions.question: This is the first - and only - hackerspace in Winnipeg
Winnipeg officially became a city in this year (the same year that Manitoba became a province)
The Northwest Company built this fort, which was re-built in 1978 by the Festival du Voyageur
This ship is the featured exhibit at the Manitoba Museum
This is Winnipeg's motto (Latin or English are fine)
questions.answer: "Unum Cum Virtute Multorum" (One with the Strength of Many)

questions.question: This race is well known for their combative attitude and ridged foreheads

This typically runs from 87.5 to 108.0 MHz
This is the first wireless standard to use the 5.4ghz band
It's what WEP stands for

According to (likely incorrect) legend, this is the reason the Pilgrims chose to land at Plymouth Rock

With the help of her watcher, Ruper Giles, she fights the undead in a long running sci fi series
She and Fox Mulder track paranormal activities for the FBI
